content: विलासिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नीं|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Sportive, playful, dallying, wanton, coquettish; <ls>R. 6. 14.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A sensualist, voluptuary, an amorous person; उपमानमभूद्विलासिनां करणं यत्तव कांतिमतया <ls>Ku. 4. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Fire. {@--3@} The moon. {@--4@} A snake. {@--5@} An epithet of Kṛshṇa or Viṣṇu. {@--6@} Of Śiva. {@--7@} Of the god of love.
